medicineShop.title: Medicine Shop
medicineShop.technologies: NextJS | Tailwind | ShadcnUI | MongoDB | Mongoose | JWT | Vercel | Nodejs | ExpressJS
details: 1. A full-stack website where admin can add medicines and users can order following specific rules.
2. Admin can perform CRUD operations on users and orders. Users can also manage their orders.
3. ShurjoPay payment gateway is implemented with proper payment verification.

bookShop.title: Book Shop
bookShop.technologies: Vite | Tailwind | ShadcnUI | MongoDB | Mongoose | JWT | Vercel | Nodejs | ExpressJS
details: 1. A full-stack website where users can order books.
2. Orders can be placed directly from the book details page.
3. Ordered books appear in the 'My Orders' page and can be removed anytime.

mediMart.title: MediMart
mediMart.technologies: NextJS | Tailwind | ShadcnUI | MongoDB | Mongoose | JWT | Vercel | Nodejs | ExpressJS
details: 1. Users can register/login securely with JWT.
2. Admin can manage orders and inventory.
3. Users can add medicines to cart and checkout.

bicycleMart.title: Bicycle Store
bicycleMart.technologies: Vite | Tailwind | ShadcnUI | MongoDB | Mongoose | JWT | Vercel | Nodejs | ExpressJS
details: 1. Users can register/login securely with JWT.
2. Admin can manage orders and inventory.
3. Users can add Bicycle to cart and checkout.

healthyFood.title: JEZ SALAD
healthyFood.technologies: React | Tailwind CSS | DaisyUI | Swiper | Recharts | React Counter
details: 1. Responsive Design: Built with mobile-first responsiveness using Tailwind CSS to ensure seamless experience across devices.
2. Modern UI: Clean and attractive layout focusing on healthy lifestyle aesthetics, using fresh color schemes and intuitive navigation.
3. Frontend Focus: Purely frontend project developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (or your chosen stack), emphasizing layout structure, animations, and user interface components.

furniture.title: Vintage Furniture
furniture.technologies: React | Tailwind CSS | DaisyUI | Swiper | React Dom
details: 1. Classic Aesthetic Design: Designed with elegant, timeless styles and warm color palettes to reflect the vintage furniture theme.
2. Fully Responsive Layout: Optimized for all screen sizes using Tailwind CSS, ensuring accessibility and usability on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
3. Frontend-Only Build: Focused entirely on frontend development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (or your stack), showcasing layout design and component structure.
